snippet: The sprawling campus where the Antonov company once designed and built prototypes of the world’s largest transport aircraft — flying whales whose very bulk symbolized Soviet might — lacks buzz these days.
abstract: Antonov aircraft company's most promising joint venture, short-takeoff, heavy-lift plane that Russian military had sought for years, has been terminated as a result of crisis in Ukraine; independent Ukrainian military analyst Valentyn Badrak says government should sell shares and order many planes to ensure that Antonov survives given that Ukraine's economy is expected to shrink by more than 6.5 percent in 2014 alone.
lead_paragraph: The sprawling campus where the Antonov company once designed and built prototypes of the world’s largest transport aircraft — flying whales whose very bulk symbolized Soviet might — lacks buzz these days.

headline.main: Aviation Giant Is Nearly Grounded in Ukraine
headline.print_headline: Aviation Giant Is Nearly Grounded in Ukraine
